ACE.description: Checks the accessibility of EPUB files with ACE.

DeACSM.description: ACSM Input Plugin - Takes an Adobe ACSM file and converts that into a useable EPUB or PDF file. Python reimplementation of libgourou by Grégory Soutadé

ANOBII.description: Downloads metadata en covers van Anobii

APNX Generator.description: Generate Amazon APNX page number file

Access Aide.description: Enhance accessibility features in EPUB files.

Action Chains.description: Automate calibre by chaining actions together and running them through a menu or a keybaord shortcut. Choose from calibre actions, your own custom actions, or from plugin builtins. Run chains automatically in response to events. Includes a Formulas action to do calculations on multiple rows.

Adlibris.se.description: Handla böcker, skönlitteratur och facklitteratur hos Adlibris bokhandel. Priserna ligger lägst på marknaden vilket har noterats i ett flertal test i media.

Amazon.com Multiple Countries.description: Downloads metadata and covers from an alternative Amazon country portal. Works in tandem with the builtin plugin to enable downloading from multiple Amazon domains

Anobii Fetcher.description: Get the metadata of book from anobii.com

Antikvarium_hu.description: Downloads metadata and cover from antikvarium.hu

Apple Books covers.description: Downloads high resolution covers from the Apple Books store

Ask AI Plugin.description: Ask questions about books using multiple AI providers

Ask Grok.description: Ask questions about a book using AI

Import Audiobooks Metadata.description: Import metadata from various audio formats including m4b, m4a, mp3, ogg, opus, flac, wma, mp4, and aiff

Audio M3U.description: Audiobook support based on M3U files

AudioBook_Duration.description: Plugin for obtain the duration of audio files

Audiobookshelf Sync.description: Get metadata from a connected Audiobookshelf instance

Audit Log.description: Undo/Reverse most metadata deletes and updates weeks later for selected books and log entries.  Creates a log entry for every addition, change or delete for most Calibre standard metadata columns, and for all custom metadata columns.

Author Book Count.description: Updates a custom column for the total number of books written by each author for every book in your library. It has functionality that standard Calibre does not provide, especially the ability to search using queries constructed with integers. Example: ((#abc_numeric:">6") and (#abc_numeric:"<47")). Its ABC column in the Tag Browser has full functionality based specifically on ABC.

Author Book Count Hierarchy.description: Creates a Hierarchy of Author Book Counts designed for perusing complex Co-Author relationships, not just simple ABC counts for a single Author.

BBC GoodFood Recipe Reader.description: Converts BBC GoodFood recipes to ebooks

BOL_NL.description: Downloads metadata en covers van BOL.com or from Literatuurplein.nl

Babelio_db.description: Downloads metadata and covers from www.babelio.com

Backup Configuration Folder.description: Backup the current calibre configuration folder when calibre is closed

Baen.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Baen

Barnes & Noble.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Barnes & Noble

Beam Ebooks.description: Downloads Metadata and covers from Beam Ebooks

Biblionet_gr.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Biblionet.gr

Bokus.description: Handla böcker online - billigt, snabbt & enkelt!

BookFusion Plugin.description: Provides synchronization of your eBooks and metadata from Calibre to your devices via the BookFusion iOS, Android & Web reader.

Bulk img resizer.description: Resize all images and keep them under specified resolution

Calibre Config Reports.description: A comprehensive configuration reporting tool for Calibre that provides detailed information about your setup. It displays installed plugins, custom columns, keyboard shortcuts, and Calibre settings in an organized, searchable interface. The plugin offers powerful filtering capabilities, export options, and the ability to copy configuration details for troubleshooting or sharing.

CalibreSpy.description: Light GUI for browsing, viewing, searching using VLs and many other search tools, and using many libraries simultaneously by multiple users without running the Calibre GUI itself.

Category Tags.description: Tag authors, publishers, sereis and other items

Check Books.description: Check your books with ACE and EPUBCheck

Clean Metadata.description: Cleans up the meatadata of books in your library, like titke, authors, series and so on

Clipboard Search.description: Execute a Calibre search using text currently on the clipboard

Comfy Reminders.description: Create and manage reminders with an integrated notebook

Comicvine.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Comicvine

Comments Cleaner.description: Remove the scraps CSS in HTML comments

Consolidate All Library Metadata.description: Consolidate a Snapshot of All Metadata, including Custom Columns, from All of the Books in All of your Libraries for Review, Analysis and Custom Column Standardization using Powerful Tools; Perform Centralized Library Custom Column Metadata Maintenance.

Copy Cover To Device.description: Copy cover(s) to device to use as Standby/PowerOff image(s)

Count Pages.description: Count number of pages/words in an ePub/Mobi to store in custom columns

djvumaker.description: Convert raster-based document files (Postscript, PDF) to DJVU with GUI button and on-import

DOC Input.description: Convert DOC files via docx to HTML

databazeknih.cz.description: Downloads metadata and covers from databazeknih.

DNB_DE.description: Downloads metadata from the DNB (Deutsche National Bibliothek).

Douban Books.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Douban.com. Useful only for Chinese language books.

Drop Search Results.description: Drag-and-Drop Search Results from most search software (e.g. 'Agent Ransack', 'X1', Windows Search) into Calibre so that the books that were found can be automatically marked and displayed.

EBook Metaguider (intellireading).description: Adds a button to toolbar and context menu, to convert epub and kepub files to a metaguided format, improving your focus and reading speed (sometimes called bionic reading).

Ebook Translator.description: A Calibre plugin to translate ebook into a specified language (optionally keeping the original content).

Editor Chains.description: Automate various tasks in Calibre's ebook editor. Plugin allows to chain multiple actions together. You can choose from Plugin specific actions, calibre builtin actions, or create you own actions through the plugin's module editor.

Embed Comic Metadata.description: Embeds calibre metadata into comic archives and imports                            metadata from comic archives into calibre.

English Noun Frequency.description: Determine 'English Noun Frequencies' for words in a particular book's text, and optionally: 1) Add frequences for the chosen number of frequent nouns to the book's Comments; 2) Create new Tags using the chosen number of frequent nouns for Tags; 3) Update a Custom Column with the chosen number of frequent nouns for a Custom Column.; 4) Update nothing but log the frequent nouns using the number chosen for Comments; 5) Translate the English Comments to another language, showing both; 6) Accumulate the Top 100 English Nouns with frequency counts across all of your books and all of you libraries.

Entities Manager.description: Associate Calibre Entities to Links, Notes, and other Entities, plus other information independent of any particular book.

EpubMerge.description: UI plugin to concatenate multiple epubs into one.

EpubSplit.description: UI plugin to split off parts of an epub into a new book.

Ex Libris.description: Add a nice ex libris to your EPUB eBook

Extract ISBN.description: Extracts the ISBN from the text content of a book format if available

Extract People Other Metadata.description: Extract People & Other Metadata from EPUBs then Update in Custom Columns

Extract RIS Citations.description: Extract a Citation from RIS tags then update the new book's bibliographic metadata.

FanFicFare.description: UI plugin to download FanFiction stories from various sites.

Fantastic Fiction.description: Downloads metadata and covers from FantasticFiction.com

Fantastic Fiction Adults.description: Downloads metadata and covers from ffadultsonly.com

Favourites Menu.description: Create a customised toolbar menu button for features from other plugins or calibre menus to save screen space

Find Duplicates.description: Find possible duplicate books based on their metadata

Generate Cover.description: Generate covers in Calibre with appearance options

GetFileName.description: Store the filename of the imported book in a custom column

Goodreads Sync.description: Sync from Calibre with the shelves of your goodreads.com account

Hyphenate This!.description: Hyphenate books for readers supporting soft hyphens.

INMONDADORI.description: Get book details from inmondadori.com book page in a separate thread

ISFDB3.description: Downloads metadata and covers from ISFDB (https://www.isfdb.org/)

Import List.description: Import lists of books from clipboard, CSV or web

Input Order Swap.description: Toolbar button to swap the top two formats in the preferred input order

Job Spy.description: JS+: Big Tool Box of 80 unique functions to make Calibre better.

K2pdfopt Plugin.description: Optimizes PDFs for viewing on small screens like ereaders

Kindle Collections.description: Manage Kindle collections and settings using Calibre

KindleUnpack - The Plugin.description: Unpacks a Kindle Book/MOBI into its source components.

Kitapyurdu.description: Downloads metadata and covers from kitapyurdu.com

Kobo Metadata.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Kobo

Kobo Utilities.description: Utilities to use with Kobo ereaders

KoboTouch - Metaguide Driver (intellirea.description: WARNING: PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE INSTALLING. This driver IS NOT REQUIRED to send ebooks to your Kobo device - Calibre already includes a Kobo driver. DO NOT INSTALL this driver if you do not know what metaguiding is and how it works and if your intention is not to explicitly use metaguiding on your Kobo device. For more information, visit https://go.hugobatista.com/gh/intellireading-calibre-plugins or https://go.hugobatista.com/intellireading . This driver will metaguide ANY epub/kepub file you send to the device, by modifying its content and adding additional markup to the text, like bold tags, eventually improving your reading experience, your focus and reading speed (sometimes called bionic reading).

KoboTouch Config Button.description: Quick access to KoboTouch device driver configuration

KyBook3 Sync.description: Syncs books and metadata to KyBook3

LCPL Input.description: Downloads LCP-encrypted books from a LCPL license file. Note: This does not remove the LCP DRM.

Language Cleaner.description: Replace naughty or offensive language with something more acceptable (to me at least)

Last Modified.description: Update a custom date column(s) based on events like book metadata changes, formats changes .... etc

Legie.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Legie.info (only books in Czech, mainly sci-fi and fantasy)

Library Codes - SRU.description: Derive Library of Congress Codes, Dewey Decimal Codes, and/or OCLC-OWI plus Other Identifiers for Selected Books Using ISBN or ISSN.

Library Splitter.description: Front-end to Calibre's Copy/Move Book functions.  Automatically copies or moves books from the current library to a target library based on each book's metadata value in a '#target_library' Custom Column.

LibraryThing Match.description: Compare your LibraryThing library with your calibre e-books.

Libri_hu.description: Downloads metadata and cover from libri.hu

LubimyCzytac.description: Download book metadata and covers from LubimyCzytac.pl

Manage Series.description: A GUI for manipulating selected books into a series

Mass Search-Replace.description: Easily apply a list of multiple saved Find and Replace operations to your books metadata

Media File Importer.description: Drag media file paths and Drop them to automatically create new books within Calibre having dynamically created metadata, plus a copy of the original media file placed into the same directory as the new book.  For use in a Workbench/Intake Library only.

Modify ePub.description: Apply cleanup tasks and updates to an ePub without doing a conversion

Moly_hu.description: Downloads metadata and covers from moly.hu

MultiColumnSearch.description: Advanced Search Tools: Inter-Book; Intra-Book; Cross-Library; Full-Text; Word-Book Index Search; Native SQL Queries; Cross-Library Duplicate Books per Custom Columns; and more.

Open With.description: Open format or cover of book in a specified external application

PDFtoCBZ.description: Convertit les livres PDF en CBZ avec choix du format et compression

Prettify Cover.description: Scale book-covers proportional to the size of e-readers screen.

Prince PDF.description: Converts to PDF using the Prince software (third-party)

QRCode Tracker Filidel.description: Inserts a generated QR code image at the end of every chapter, to help tracking reading progress.

Quality Check.description: Query your library for poor quality covers or invalid metadata

QuarantineAndScrub.description: [For Advanced Calibre Users Only: Must Download Special Database From mobileread.com] Clean Malformed, Misplaced or Missing Author, Title, Series, Index, ISBN; Tag Scrubber, Deriver, Propagator, Defaulter & Minimizer; Series Deriver & Consolidator; Series & Index Validator/Corrector; Genre Deriver; LCC & DDC Deriver; Book Awards; & Much More

Quick Preferences.description: Allows quickly changing common preferences via a toolbar menu or shortcuts

Read Audiobooks metadata.description: Read metadata from m4b,m4a files, perhaps more in future...

Read MP3 AudioBook metadata.description:
Reads metadata from an MP3, M4B, AA and F4B AudioBook file, or M3U playlist.
Uses eyeD3-0.6.17j; mp4file-0.2j; pyaudibletags-1.0.1; flvlib-0.1.12 for parsing files.

Reading List.description: Define orderable lists of books and synchronise to devices/folders

Recoll Full Text Search.description: A plugin to do a full text search with recoll

Reformat plugin.description: Simplifies structure and corrects format of EPUB files

Scroll Book Details.description: Use spacebar (or any configured keyboard shortcut) to scroll info in book details panel.

Search The Internet.description: Search various websites for the selected books

Similar Stories.description: Find stories similar to first selected book using full text information and store similarity score in a custom column

Smashwords Metadata.description: Downloads metadata and covers from Smashwords

Sony PRS-T1 notes plugin.description: Manages notes (handwriting) of your Sony PRS-T1 device

Create MP3 audiobook using MSWindows Text-to-Speech

Unplugged.description: Enables "unplugged mode", where new devices are not detected

User Category.description: Add or remove to user categories based on the selected book(s)

VL from selection.description: Create a Virtual Library from selected book IDs quickly, optionally applying tags to the selected books

View Manager.description: Define your own sets of column views with sort orders

Walk Search History.description: Enables a goto previous/next shortcut for your search history

WordDumb.description: Create Kindle Word Wise and X-Ray file and EPUB footnotes then send to e-reader.

X-Ray Creator.description: A plugin to create X-Ray files for Kindle books

Zotero Metadata Importer.description: Add Zotero documents and files plus their metadata to Calibre as books using the normal .csv file exported by Zotero.  Compare items in Zotero to books in Calibre. Export an RIS file with Calibre books and their metadata for import into Zotero.
